message: I'm feeling generous.  Take this 1000 and let's get this over with!
You're not being very generous, are you? I'll take a smaller share this time, but I expect a better offer next round!
Okay, I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 60/40.  It's a fair deal, and we can both get this over with.
You're not willing to give me a better deal? I'll take a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to let you get away with a 60/40 split!
